Question: What are the two keywords most relevant to the first and second charts?

A. Revenue and Profit
B. Information Entropy and Layers
C. Sales and Growth
D. Performance and Metrics

Question: Firstly, identify a labeled range on the x-axis in the second chart where the difference between BLEU(perturbed) and BLEU(raw) is the largest when Ranked Subsets by G Value falls within this range. Denote this labeled range as \( r_0 \).  
Then, in the first chart, what is the value of G Value when Ranked Subsets by G Value falls within the labeled range \( r_0 \)?
Note that Your final answer must be grounded to a number that is explicitly written and relevant to the question in the chart, even if it is an approximate value. You should omit the unit after any number. You are allowed to extract numbers within some text when needed.
Note that your answer format should be as follows: Answer: The_answer_you_get.
